name: Rough Waters
description:
Face treacherous waters as you get three rafts through a dangerous river. Thing is, the rafts are connected to each other so you're going to have to pull, push and dodge each other to get to the other side. 

They may encounter the odd floating goat that they have to save and some bonus coins. Connected by chains, they have to cross various obstacles and hungry crocodiles. 

Play solo or co-op and try to get all the rafts to the end together.
